who have nothing to guard and everything to share. Who connect the dots using whatever means necessary...be it a book or a journal article, blog post or Youtube video. Who don't see their job as the gatekeeper to a warehouse of dead scrolls...but as connector, teacher, and raconteur of an infinite pool of possibility.
In a word, curators curate. The best way they know how. Streamlining the grunt work of discovery and selection for the rest of us.
